items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute and warm
items.body: These cardigans are such good quality they are thick cotton and super comfortable. I definitely will purchase more. I did get a large which is my size and its fits perfectly. Iâ€™m 5,5 and 170 lbs cardigan falls right off my waist. Read more
items.author: J Flores

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality
items.body: Great quality and color. Very comfortable. I bought a size large for a loose fit which I love except the sleeves are too long. but otherwise it's great. Read more
items.author: Shayna

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great quality. Great style. Sizes super large
items.body: I initially ordered two different colors in small because Amazon recommended I choose the small. The small was really a large, even for a relaxed fit. I returned them and ordered an extra small. That is still very very relaxed and almost too large. probably the equivalent of a medium, but Iâ€™m keeping it because I like that it hits just right for me, at the hip bone and the quality is very good. Itâ€™s a medium weight 100% cotton. I gave it four stars instead of five because the exaggerated sizing Read more
items.author: anonyme

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit and great quality
items.body: I love this cardigan. It is 100% cotton and fits true to size. Quince has a very similar one at more than double the price. This one is not too heacy as 100% cotton can sometimes be and it is very soft. I am going to buy again in Navy! Read more
items.author: Sara

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cheap
items.body: Decent quality just a little too big, box-y and generic for meâ€¦plus the cost if Amazon cheap clothes is no longer affordable Read more
items.author: Shan in Texas

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality and so soft and comfortable.
items.body: I purchased the coffee in 2XL. It is true to size, it does not swallow the frame and it is so soft. I like that I have room to wear it with a top or a tank underneath comfortably. The neckline is low but it does not make the sweater look frumpy when all three buttons are done up. Jeans, skirts, slacks all good. The weave is a nice tight weave with a nice weight. I have three other Amazon sweaters and the quality after washing has never been an issue- all 100% cotton. I genuinely love the sweater so much after trying it on, I immediately purchased the tan. The price for the level of quality is amazing. I spy navy ðŸ‘€ in my future. Read more
items.author: KOWENS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy every color!
items.body: Great quality, thick enough for fall / winter, but also great to keep in a chilly office throughout the warmer months. Bought the navy and purchased a 2nd color after seeing the quality. Drapes easily over the shoulders, and the length is more cropped. Looks great with skirts or pants, petite-friendly. Read more
items.author: Elsa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Absolutely LOVE these sweaters!
items.body: I absolutely LOVE these sweaters! After wearing the first one and receiving so many genuine compliments on it, I immediately ordered 3 more! I knew right away these were going to be favorites - and they are! It's soft and comfortable, the colors are bright and go with just about everything. I wear mine over light shirts, and the sweater provides nice coverage and takes the chill out of the air. It doesn't matter where I wear these sweaters, or for how long I wear them, people always stop me to tell me they really like them. I'm trying to decide right now which color I want to add to my growing collection! (I just wish they carried it in a pretty, bright pink!) Style: Trendy but simple and cute! Read more
items.author: Oak Ridge Badger

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Tan, Navy, Eggshell White, Lime Green, Purple, Espresso, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
